languages.text: "На Тассере я наш{mf|ел|ла} материал, который называется тассерций. Это сильнейший псифокус. Я принял{mf||а} решение уничтожить его по соображениям безопасности Империума".
"I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
languages.original_text: "На Тассере я наш{mf|ел|ла} материал, который называется тассерций. Это сильнейший псифокус. Я принял{mf||а} решение уничтожить его по соображениям безопасности Империума".

traits.locale_text: I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
"I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I prohibited its extraction in the interests of the Imperium's security."
I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
"I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
"I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."
I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

languages.text: 「タッセーラでタッセリウムと呼ばれる物質を発見した。強力な超能力集中だ。帝国の安全を考慮し、その物質を破壊した」
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: 「タッセーラでタッセリウムと呼ばれる物質を発見した。強力な超能力集中だ。帝国の安全を考慮し、その採掘を禁じた」

languages.text: "Ich habe auf Thassera ein Material namens Thassertium entdeckt, einen mächtigen Psi-Fokus. Ich habe ihn zerstören lassen, um die Sicherheit des Imperiums zu wahren."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe auf Thassera ein Material namens Thassertium entdeckt, einen mächtigen Psi-Fokus. Ich habe ihn zerstören lassen, um die Sicherheit des Imperiums zu wahren."

languages.text: « Sur Thassera, j'ai découvert un matériau nommé thassertium, un puissant concentrateur psionique. Afin de préserver la sécurité de l'Imperium, j'ai décidé de le faire détruire. »
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: « Sur Thassera, j'ai découvert un matériau nommé thassertium, un puissant concentrateur psionique. Afin de préserver la sécurité de l'Imperium, j'ai décidé de le faire détruire. »

languages.text: «Descubrí en Thassera un material conocido como thassertio, con peligrosas propiedades como foco psíquico. Ordené su destrucción en aras de la seguridad del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: «Descubrí en Thassera un material conocido como thassertio, con peligrosas propiedades como foco psíquico. Ordené su destrucción en aras de la seguridad del Imperium».

languages.text: “我在塔瑟拉发现了一种叫做‘塔瑟拉水晶’的物质，拥有强大的灵能活性。为了帝国的安全考虑，我下令销毁这种矿物。”
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: “我在塔瑟拉发现了一种叫做‘塔瑟拉水晶’的物质，拥有强大的灵能活性。为了帝国的安全考虑，我下令销毁这种矿物。”

languages.text: "Thassera'da tasertiyum denen güçlü bir ruhsezi odağını keşfettim. İmparatorluk'un güvenliği için bu şeyin yok edilmesini emrettim."
languages.original_text: "I discovered a material on Thassera known as thassertium, a potent psy-focus. I had it destroyed in the interests of the Imperium's security."

traits.locale_text: "Thassera'da tasertiyum denen güçlü bir ruhsezi odağını keşfettim. İmparatorluk'un güvenliği için bu şeyin yok edilmesini emrettim."
